mapper.insert: insert into plan_review(user_id, plan_idx, review_content, review_img, review_rating) values (#{user_id}, #{plan_idx}, #{review_content}, #{review_img}, #{review_rating})
mapper.select: select review_idx, user_id, plan_idx, review_content, review_img, review_rating, create_date, update_date from plan_review where user_id like CONCAT('%',#{keyword},'%') review_content like CONCAT('%',#{keyword},'%') 1=1 order by review_idx desc limit #{pageStart}, #{perPageNum}
select count(review_idx) from plan_review where user_id like CONCAT('%',#{keyword},'%') review_content like CONCAT('%',#{keyword},'%') 1=1
